text: Marcin Boguś (born 11 July 1973) is a retired Polish football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Widzew Łódź players Category:Zagłębie Lubin players Category:Ceramika Opoczno players Category:Górnik Łęczna players Category:KSZO Ostrowiec Świętokrzyski players Category:Association football defenders
title: Marcin Boguś
